channel.title: Notes on M'Sync
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on M'Sync

item.title: The History of Attention
item.description: A comprehensive analysis tracing the evolution of attention mechanisms from bag-of-words models to FlashAttention, examining the mathematical foundations and interdisciplinary connections that enabled modern AI.

item.title: Notes: LLM From Scratch
item.description: Notes and pointers during the exploration of the book LLM From Scratch by Sebastian Raschka. Comprehensive exploration of tokenization, embeddings, and building language models from scratch.
